title: Hi, Can we e-mail Google support about a complaint?
content: So I've been approved for a refurbished replacement phone for my pixel 4xl due to black spot on the screen. The one I have was already replaced once before due to face unlock not working. It's been over a month and I've still haven't got the phone and everytime I contact customer support, they give me the same answer. Is there an email address that i could sense my grievance?
